skillTree.localised_description: Like his predecessor, Piggolo II doesn't crave the battlefield. But when hand-to-hand combat is required, or rather tusk-to-groin, he is clad in a custom panoply proper for his status and girth.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The chest wagon is Piggolo's most customary campaigning mount.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The re-experimental tank is Piggolo's ultimate battle mount, from within which his tactical acumen can dominate the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the goddess Myrmidia, if not a member outright. Myrmidia is an ascended mortal and the chief deity in the south, and the vast influence of her cults teach tactical acumen, mercy, and civilization.

effects.description: Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after winning a battle

skillTree.localised_description: By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of Nahmud, if not a member outright. Although part of the vaster Myrmidian cults, the various sects of Nahmud favour equality and special education, and are somewhat too fond of secrecy.

By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of Sister Fury, if not a member outright. One of Myrmidia's companions in life, Fury's legacy is one of intense, violent, but controlled rage and violence against injustice and destruction.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the god Solkan, if not a member outright. The merciless god is one of the most ancient, and just as timeless is his unbridled retribution against the corrupted. His is currently a relatively awkward presence, strongest in Remas.

By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the god Morr, if not a member outright. The old god of the dead's legacy is one of fatalism and certainty, and finds its largest seat in Luccini.

effects.description:
Battle healing cap: -10%
	(enemy armies in local region)
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

skillTree.localised_description: By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the goddess Shallya, if not a member outright. Her teachings of healing and compassion feel at odds with the world's grimness and darkness, which is also why many flock to her.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the goddess Verena, if not a member outright. Like her husband Morr, the blind deity's legacy is not only one of learning and justice, but also one of detached impartiality.

By a combination of inclination, faith and training, this character is aligned with the cults of the god Ranald, if not a member outright. He is one of many and sometimes darker aspects, but the lord of fortune was also the only one who could make Morr smile. Somewhat.

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

skillTree.localised_description: "Truly inspiring, my lord."

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Wild Heart" for all spellcasters
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "At once, my lord."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description:
"So very efficient, my lord." 
	"Why didn't we think of that before?"

"Your presence has certainly gotten majestic and, err, enormous, my lord." 
	"Girthy." 
	"Heroic!"

"My lord, not in ther- oh, gods, not again."
	"Fetch the Bath Guard with buckets this instant!"

"Astrounding, my lord." 
	"Truly amazing." 
	"Unprecedented! Revolutionary!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: "Astute, my lord."
"They shall tremble at your mere sight, my prince."
"Indeed, my lord, they will fire at will and with efficiency if they value their double pay!"

"Wait, that actually made sen-"
	"Shush, you bottom-feeder! Just genius, my lord!"

"Another one, my lord?"
	"I swear, it's like truffles."

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +7%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +50%

skillTree.localised_description:
"We haven't seen such military prowess since Prince Borgio!"
	"You do know he's alive, yes?"

effects.description: Ability: "Full Ham" (when Piggolo II is dismounted)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: War is merely the extension of economy by other means. But you do need someone to do the actual killing.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Mercenary Captains
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: This man can easily distinguish between an ancient elven magical sword of implacable might and a piece of shiny iron, which is not so simple when the artifact itself is in that disguise.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Kill not, waste not.
Sometimes it is just time to party. The louder, the better.

"Open the coffers, put up more signs. I want more cannons, pikes, even ogres, even those buggers with the paper wings. Everyone. I shall have that castle by tomorrow or by Myrmidia I will drown them in mercs."
Money must flow.
"People say that the colour of magic is purple, white, red... I say it is gold. For all that lot."

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Battle Wizard
	(local province)

Hero recruitment cost: +5% for Wizards
	(local province)

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Battle Wizard
	(local province)

Hero recruitment cost: +10% for Wizards
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: Improving infrastructure and rebuilding the war-ravaged regions is key to a prosperous economy.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -4% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -7% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Being supportive of the flourishing tilean art is prestigious, and prestige is lucrative.
Commerce is the life-blood of any economy, and the sea must be its heart.
Personally seizing the means of production never felt better.
Such is the pinnacle of the tilean merchant prince and politician that seemingly anything can be handled.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description:
Such unrivalled talent, unmitigated brilliance, unparalleled strategy, a pig destined to rule and lead to a new golden age. 
	Or so his guardians say, as they translate Piggolo's every though, move and project.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

Passive ability: "Guardian" for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Hero's army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
